sentence.Network_en: The boy would not go, but stood at the door glowering at his father.
sentence.Network_cn: 那男孩不肯走, 他站在门口对他父亲怒目而视.

sentence.Network_en: Then he withdrew to a corner and sat glowering at his wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后他溜到一个角落外,坐在那怒视着他的妻子.

sentence.Network_en: " We met him up the street, glowering. Must be because we're so late.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我们到街口碰到他, 他生气样子, 一定是怪我们不早回来. ”

entry.def: If you describe a person as glowering, you mean they look angry and bad tempered.

example.tran: 他那气呼呼的英俊模样

entry.def: If you describe a place as glowering, you mean that it looks dark and threatening.

sentences.sentence: "a saturnine, almost misanthropic young genius"- Bruce Bliven
